mapper.delete: delete from report_bill_all where bill_type ='al' and bill_creater_time >1501516800000 and sign_time is null
delete from report_bill_all where bill_type ='dy' and bill_status !=6 and bill_creater_time >1501516800000

mapper.update:
update report_bill_all
bill_owner_id = #{billOwnerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bill_vender_id = #{billVenderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bill_driver_id = #{billDriverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bill_receive_id = #{billReceiveId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bill_type = #{billType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
owner_name = #{ownerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business_time = #{businessTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plan_no = #{planNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bill_no = #{billNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
send_man = #{sendMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
send_persion = #{sendPersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receipt_man = #{receiptMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receipt_persion = #{receiptPersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vehicle_no = #{vehicleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cargo_name = #{cargoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
route_name = #{routeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bill_distinct = #{distinct,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vender_weight = #{venderWeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pickup_weight = #{pickupWeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unload_weight = #{unloadWeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
true_weight = #{trueWeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bill_status = #{billStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver_name = #{driverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_ment = #{payMent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bill_creater_time = #{billCreaterTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
accept_time = #{acceptTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
pickup_time = #{pickupTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
unload_time = #{unloadTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sign_time = #{signTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
desc1 = #{desc1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
desc2 = #{desc2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
desc3 = #{desc3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
desc4 = #{desc4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update report_bill_all set bill_owner_id = #{billOwnerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bill_vender_id = #{billVenderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bill_driver_id = #{billDriverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bill_receive_id = #{billReceiveId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bill_type = #{billType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, owner_name = #{ownerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_time = #{businessTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plan_no = #{planNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bill_no = #{billNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_man = #{sendMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_persion = #{sendPersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receipt_man = #{receiptMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receipt_persion = #{receiptPersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vehicle_no = #{vehicleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cargo_name = #{cargoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, route_name = #{routeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bill_distinct = #{distinct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vender_weight = #{venderWeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pickup_weight = #{pickupWeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unload_weight = #{unloadWeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, true_weight = #{trueWeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bill_status = #{billStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, driver_name = #{driverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_ment = #{payMent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bill_creater_time = #{billCreaterTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, accept_time = #{acceptTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, pickup_time = #{pickupTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, unload_time = #{unloadTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sign_time = #{signTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, desc1 = #{desc1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, desc2 = #{desc2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, desc3 = #{desc3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, desc4 = #{desc4,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(*) FROM anlian_bill bill LEFT JOIN wuliu_plan plan ON plan.ID = bill.desc1
select count(*) FROM wuliu_bill bill LEFT JOIN wuliu_plan plan ON plan.ID=bill.planid where bill.waybillno != '批量运单'
select id FROM report_bill_all where bill_type ='dy'
select id FROM report_bill_all where bill_type ='al'

SELECT bill.id id, bill.ownerid bill_owner_id, bill.venderid bill_vender_id, bill.driverid bill_driver_id, bill.receive_memberid bill_receive_id, bill.createtime business_time, plan.planCode plan_no, bill.billno bill_no, plan.shipperMerchant sendManId, plan.sendPerson send_persion, plan.consigneeMerchant receiptManId, bill.shr receipt_persion, bill.cph vehicle_no, plan.cargoname cargo_name, plan.routeid routeId, plan.distance bill_distinct, bill.zzl vender_weight, bill.trueweight pickup_weight, bill.trueweight unload_weight, bill.trueweight true_weight, bill.desc4 bill_status, bill.payment pay_ment, bill.createtime bill_creater_time, bill.createtime accept_time, bill.createtime pickup_time, bill.signtime unload_time, bill.signtime sign_time FROM anlian_bill bill LEFT JOIN wuliu_plan plan ON plan.ID = bill.desc1 ORDER BY bill.createtime desc LIMIT #{start},#{limit}

SELECT bill.id id, bill.ownerid bill_owner_id, bill.venderid bill_vender_id, bill.driverid bill_driver_id, bill.receive_memberid bill_receive_id, bill.createtime bill_creater_time, bill.planCode plan_no, bill.waybillno bill_no, plan.shipperMerchant sendManId, plan.sendPerson send_persion, plan.consigneeMerchant receiptManId, bill.receivername receipt_persion, bill.vehicleno vehicle_no, plan.cargoname cargo_name, plan.routeid routeId, plan.distance bill_distinct, bill.weight vender_weight, bill.pickupweight pickup_weight, bill.signweight unload_weight, bill.trueweight true_weight, bill.status bill_status, bill.payment pay_ment, bill.acctepttime business_time, bill.ownerSigntime sign_time, bill.acctepttime accept_time, bill.begintime pickup_time, bill.unloadtime unload_time, bill.drivername driver_name FROM wuliu_bill bill LEFT JOIN wuliu_plan plan ON plan.id = bill.planid where bill.waybillno != '批量运单' ORDER BY bill.createtime desc LIMIT #{start},#{limit}
